revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Motorola |model=SURFboard SBG6782-AC |revision=(Arris) |upc=723905954505 |asin=B00GJ7Y7MU,B00ERXBV9K |fcc_date=05/20/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router,cable modem, |fcc_id=W5HSBG6782ACH |ic_id=5117A-SBG6782ACH |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=C7 |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3383 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=32 MiB |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model= |ram1=128 MiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4331 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53124 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=DOCSIS 3.0, MoCA 1.1 |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=Motorola |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|SBG6782 DOCSIS 3.0 Wireless Gateway}} :[http://www.arrisi.com/products/home/sbg6782-ac.asp '''Arris''' product page] {{•}} [http://www.arrisi.com/modems/datasheet/SBG6782/SBG6782_Data_Sheet.pdf Datasheet] {{•}} [http://www.arrisi.com/modems/datasheet/SBG6782/SURFboard_SBG6782_AC_User_Guide.pdf User Guide] {{see also|Arris SBG6782-AC|List of DOCSIS Cable Modems}}
<small>Note: '''[[Arris]]''' is the new (and current) owner of '''[[Motorola]] Home''', '''[[wikipedia:Motorola Mobility|Motorola Mobility]]''''s :(previously ''Motorola'''s cell phone [''mostly''] division, now a subsidiary of ''Google'') :broadband unit. See more info on [http://techcrunch.com/2012/12/19/motorola-home-finds-a-new-home-at-arris-google-sells-broadband-unit-for-2-35b-to-double-down-on-mobile/ ''TechCrunch''] and elsewhere...</small>
The [https://fccid.io/W5HSBG6782ACH FCC ID] covering this entry also covers the diagnostic-use model :(''SBG6782-ACHU DIAGNOSTIC''). Per the FCC photos... *"80211AC WIFI CARD", "588434-003 REV.2 JAN-30-2013" and :the ''[[Motorola]]'' logo is silkscreened on the 11ac WiFi module. :The 11ac module has two integral on-card antennas and a U.FL jack :for another with different positioning. It is using three ''[[Skyworks]]'' RFICs. *"2.4G WIFI CARD", "588434-001 REV.4", and the ''[[Motorola]]'' logo :is silkscreened on the front of the 2.4GHz WiFi module. :"PCB MADE IN CHINA" is silkscreened on the back of the card. :The 2.4GHz module has one integral on-card antenna and two U.FL jacks for :two antennas mounted in a different position (marked ''YELLOW'' and ''WHITE''). :It looks to be using three ''[[Skyworks]]'' (''SiGe'') PAMs. *The '''MoCA''' controller is from '''Entropic Communications'''. *The power supply module is a '''Delta Electronics''' ADP-48AN AA / '''Motorola''' :P/N 588239-001 (100-240VAC ~50/60Hz, 2A -> 12VDC, 4.17A, COO: China).
===Specifications=== Additional (or conflicting) information, per the datasheet, follows... *CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM3383, Flash: 32MB, RAM: 128MB (DDR3) *MoCA: ver. 1.1, DLNA, <= 16 nodes, 175Mbps MAC layer throughput *Radios: 5GHz: +23dBm HPA, 3x3 MIMO, 2.4GHz: +26dBm HPA, 3x3 MIMO
*DOCSIS IF: 8 downstream channels (max. ~343Mbps PHY rate @256QAM :+ 5.36Msys/s), 4 upstream channels (max. ~122.8Mbps @256QAM)<!--
-->{{CableModemSpec |down_c=8 |up_c=4 }}
*Power supply: 105 to 125 VAC, 60Hz (conflicts w/ FCC data) *Dimensions (H x W x L): [[Dimensions::224 mm x 54 mm x 256.5 mm]]
===Reviews=== *[http://www.pcmag.com/article2/0,2817,2423824,00.asp On '''PCMag.com'''] *[http://www.dslreports.com/hardware/ARRIS-SBG6782-AC-h4024 On '''DSL Reports''']
===Vendor links=== *[http://www.bestbuy.com/site/Motorola---SURFboard-eXtreme-802.11ac-DOCSIS-3.0-Cable-Modem-and-4-Port-Gigabit-Ethernet-Router/8855075.p?id=1218918010951&skuId=8855075 On '''BestBuy.com''']
